name: A Wild Hare
summary: Elmer is a dimwitted hunter, "wooking for wabbits." Bugs is clever, smooth-talking character, who confuses Elmer with double-talk and misdirection. Elmer is no match for the wascally wabbit, even when he thinks Bugs is dead.
info:
• 中文名: 小野兔
  • 上映年度: 1940-07-27
  • 片长: 8分钟
  • 类型: 喜剧 / 动画 / 短片 / 家庭
  • 导演: Tex Avery
  • 主演: Mel Blanc、Arthur Q. Bryan
  • 编剧: Rich Hogan
  • IMDb: tt0033260
